products.name: Debut Theme Slider (PRO)
products.details:
Premium quality, hand coded slider for one of the best free themes of Shopify: Debut. Coded by a certified Shopify partner.


One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this slider working live here: 


https://debut-theme-slider.myshopify.com/products/blue-silk-tuxedo


Installation takes less than 1 minute. 


You just need to copy and paste the files that come with this. Detailed instructions plus all features can be found here: 


https://ezfycode.com/blog/debut-shopify-theme-how-to-add-swipe-for-product-page-images


This code will be constantly updated with new features subsequently making its price go up, so make sure you get your copy now while it's cheap. 


I give 100% support to all of the current 65+ users of it, same day responses are guaranteed. If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


NOTE: This code works exclusively for the Debut theme.

products.name: Debut Theme Sticky Navbar (PRO)
products.details:
Premium quality, hand coded sticky navigation bar for the Debut Shopify theme. Coded by a certified Shopify partner.


One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this sticky navbar working live here: 


https://debut-theme-slider.myshopify.com/products/blue-silk-tuxedo


Installation takes less than 1 minute. 


This version comes with multiple customization choices embedded in the Customize page.


You just need to copy and paste the files that come with this. Detailed instructions plus all features can be found here: 


https://ezfycode.com/blog/debut-shopify-theme-how-to-add-swipe-for-product-page-images



I give 100% support to all of its users, same day response is guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


NOTE: This code works exclusively for the Debut theme.

products.name: Debut Sticky Navbar (Free Version)
products.description:
This is a solution for the Debut Theme to make the navigation bar sticky.

It contains all the code necessary to implement it on your already existing Debut theme.

Consider taking a look at the Debut Sticky Nav Pro as well! It has many more features, customization options (embedded at the customize page), frequent updates, support and bug fixes:

https://ezfy.e-junkie.com/product/1689723

For instructions regarding how to install it please follow this tutorial: 

https://ezfycode.com/blog/debut-theme-sticky-navigation-bar-tutorial

This version has limited features.
